name: Just Pop 10
description:
Tap to make adjacent numbers a multiple of 10.
The more numbers are combined together, the more score you can get.
Just like 2048 and Who Can Get 11, Just Pop 10 can be really addictive that once you begin to play, you don't want to stop or even pause!
1+1,2x2,10x10,1234,π...If you are interested in maths, you can try to unravel the wishbone combination of numbers in our updated game, like a badass mathematician.
Get bored of playing tetris, psp or psv? Then try Just Pop 10 in a soli way, one that you might feel just as addictive as Chipotle and Mathway.
Come and challenge yourself and let's see how good you are at simple addition!
